metadata.name: KK: HNY 2023
metadata.description:
Issued: December 31, 2022  
"KK:HNY 2023"  
A.I.   
2022

On December 31st, 2022 Krista Kim's community, friends & family are celebrated with a token of appreciation that unlocks exclusive access to Metaverse and Real-Life events. The journey continues in 2023 where we can come together through love and support - both virtual AND real! Join us as we look forward to meaningful connections across this amazing universe: sign up for announcements at www.Krista.Kim âœ¨

Krista Kim's AI artworks explore and build upon the concept of Metaverse, a digitized virtual world that is shared by multiple users. Her works are characterized by vibrant, surrealist landscapes, intricate structures, and peaceful energy. Through these pieces, Kim seeks to capture the sublime beauty of technology and its spiritual implications in AI art. Each work is an exploration of the journey through a new landscape, with meditative principles guiding her creative decisions and aesthetic choices.
